price: Àwọn àmì wà nínú ìṣẹ̀dá yín àti ohun tí Allāhu ń fọ́nká (sórí ilẹ̀) nínú àwọn n̄ǹkan abẹ̀mí; (àmì wà nínú wọn) fún ìjọ tó ní àmọ̀dájú.¹
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
